body_html:
hey bro:
Maybe you can try this code：

from tensorflow.contrib.nccl.python.ops import nccl_ops
nccl_ops._maybe_load_nccl_ops_so()

Okay, your solution works for importing NCCL library. Thanks!

However, after building network, sess.run() doesn't give any response and just stay in that line. I think some of codes are in infinite loop or some of GPU devices are not returning value.

I'll notice you after I fix all the things!
body_text:
hey bro:
Maybe you can try this code：
from tensorflow.contrib.nccl.python.ops import nccl_ops
nccl_ops._maybe_load_nccl_ops_so()

Okay, your solution works for importing NCCL library. Thanks!
However, after building network, sess.run() doesn't give any response and just stay in that line. I think some of codes are in infinite loop or some of GPU devices are not returning value.
I'll notice you after I fix all the things!
body:
> hey bro:
> Maybe you can try this code：
> 
> from tensorflow.contrib.nccl.python.ops import nccl_ops
> nccl_ops._maybe_load_nccl_ops_so()

Okay, your solution works for importing NCCL library. Thanks!

However, after building network, sess.run() doesn't give any response and just stay in that line. I think some of codes are in infinite loop or some of GPU devices are not returning value.

I'll notice you after I fix all the things!
